ComicInfo.Summary:
For three million years, the human race has been the final rung on the evolutionary ladder.
Nothing lasts forever . . . SIL, the U.S. government's experimental human/alien-hybrid lifeform, searches for the perfect mate with whom to propagate her species -- and ruthlessly murders anyone who stands in her way! Can Professor Fitch and his team of top scientists stop her terrifying mission before it's too late?
